CustomField.description: The calculated total of all Salary Package Components
CustomField.formula: ( ( If(text(tc9_et__Base_Salary_Superannable__c)="Yes", tc9_et__Base_Salary__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Car_Allowance_Superannable__c)="Yes", tc9_et__Car_Allowance__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Phone_Allowance_Superannable__c)="Yes", tc9_et__Phone_Allowance__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_1_Superannable__c)="Yes", tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_1__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_2_Superannable__c)="Yes", tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_2__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_3_Superannable__c)="Yes", tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_3__c, 0) + tc9_et__Other_Superannable_Components__c ) * (1+ tc9_et__Package_Superannuation_Rate__c ) ) + ( If(text(tc9_et__Base_Salary_Superannable__c)="No", tc9_et__Base_Salary__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Car_Allowance_Superannable__c)="No", tc9_et__Car_Allowance__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Phone_Allowance_Superannable__c)="No", tc9_et__Phone_Allowance__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_1_Superannable__c)="No", tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_1__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_2_Superannable__c)="No", tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_2__c, 0) + If(text(tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_3_Superannable__c)="No", tc9_et__Cust_Pack_Comp_3__c, 0) + tc9_et__Other_Non_Superannable_Components__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The calculated total of all Salary Package Components
CustomField.label: Total Salary Package
